description.content: This laid-back spa resort offers spectacular views of the Peñon de Ifach and the Mediterranean Sea. Ideal for a peaceful family holiday surrounded by nature, the hotel is still close to Calpe's amenities and services. Located 3 km from the Natural Park of Penyal d'Ifac and 5 km from Arenal-Bol beach, it promises a truly relaxing experience. Guest rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with ensuite bathrooms, mini-fridges, and flat-screen TVs with satellite channels. Upgraded rooms feature living areas with pull-out sofas and room service. The newly refurbished Supreme Bungalows offer guaranteed sea views, complimentary Wi-Fi, late check-out, and daily newspaper service. Guests can enjoy indoor and outdoor pools, a hot tub, sauna, fitness center, and spa treatments. The hotel also features a restaurant, bar/lounge, coffee shop, and room service. A buffet breakfast is available for a fee.

rooms.description: Double or Twin SIDE SEA VIEW
DOUBLE SINGLE USE WITH DOUBLE BED
